Highland.Clearwater Water Park Development:
Clearwater Water Park Development is a family entertainment company based in Ladera Ranch, California. The company ran Wild Rivers water park in Irvine, California. The company currently owns and operates and Big Air Trampoline Parks, a franchised trampoline park offering based in Ladera Ranch, California


== Parks ==
Wild Rivers (water park) (1986–2011)
Splash Kingdom Waterpark (2012-2017)
Big Air Trampoline Parks USA (2013–Present)


== Purchase of Redlands Park ==
In 2011, Clearwater purchased Splash Kingdom Waterpark in Redlands, The company changed the name to Splash Kingdom Waterpark and added several attractions.
